formattedAddress: 270 West 123rd Street Ground Floor - #1A, 270 W 123rd St #1, New York, NY 10027, USA
adrFormatAddress: 270 West 123rd Street Ground Floor - #1A, 270 W 123rd St #1, New York, NY 10027-8109, USA

originalText.text: I am truly grateful for having worked with C&C management as they’ve ended my apartment hunt in NYC. I am specifically pleased with Jisselt Garcia for having the PATIENCE and TENACITY in making sure my process was completed through what is an extremely difficult time. She followed up, responded to my concerns PROMPTLY and made great suggestions as pertaining to her area of expertise. Literally stood on the phone with me for an hour until I exhausted all questions and completed all of my paperwork. I am very happy! Thank you again.

text.text: I am truly grateful for having worked with C&C management as they’ve ended my apartment hunt in NYC. originalText.text:
What a horrible company. David, who helped us, should be fired immediately (last name left out for privacy)! We will be filing a claim against them with NYC Housing Authority and Better Business Bureau.
They say we have been selected for an interview for an Affordable Housing Apartment in NYC. When we get there, David informs us that we do not qualify for a two bedroom because we are married (it does not state this when applying). If this lazy a$$ would have taken two seconds to look over the application and saw this system error, he would have saved us A LOT of work and heartache. Again, he should be fired for doing this to us. I’m sure we are not the first!
We put our entire lives on hold for three days getting our paperwork in order, which is a ridiculous and immense amount of work!! Second, they only hold interviews during normal work hours, so we had to request the day off, with very short notice, making our bosses very unhappy.
Absolutely disgusted with the company and cannot wait to file a claim against them with the city. I hope they lose the right to represent NYC in the Affordable Housing process.

originalText.text: Covington Realty Services are phenomenal. Their expertise in managing my property has made my life so much easier. Shaun Covington is hands-on with his clients and makes them feel like they are valued. I was very pleased with his services and have felt very comfortable referring him to my circle of business associates.
